ayah.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

hadith.text: The most beloved of deeds to Allah are those that are most consistent, even if they are small.

dua.text: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
dua.translation: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

ayah.translation: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.

dua.text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
dua.translation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.

ayah.translation: Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured.

hadith.text: None of you will have faith till he wishes for his (Muslim) brother what he likes for himself.

dua.text: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
dua.translation: O Turner of the hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion.

allah_name.name: Al-Malik (الْمَلِكُ)
allah_name.meaning: The King and Owner of Dominion
